title: 20 Min Low Priority Queue
body: I got placed in a low priority queue and am unable to earn loot due to my internet going down for one single game, i tried everything in my power to join back but i just couldent. What i dont understand is it is one one game, 20 minute low priority queue and cant earn loot due to one single game, are you kidding me, please someone help i dont understand i would really like this to be lifted...
